original: dag  /rnal 'byor bcu pa bzhugs snyo//
analyzed: dag  /rnal 'byor bcu pa bzhugs snyo//
translated: The Ten Yogas

original: //_/sti si sgo/_bla ma dang mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la🔽gus pas phyag 'tshhal lo/_/shin tu stong pa'i bdag nyid can/_/ye shes lnga'i rang
analyzed: //_/sti si sgo/_bla ma dang mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la gus pas phyag 'tshhal lo/_/shin tu stong pa'i bdag nyid can/_/ye shes lnga'i rang
translated: Homage to the guru and to Lord Mañjuśrī.🔽I bow to the glorious Heruka,🔽the embodiment of great emptiness,🔽the nature of the five awarenesses,

original: bzhin dngos/_/he ru ka dpal las btud de/_/de'i bsgrub pa'i rim pa bshad/_/
analyzed: bzhin dngos/_/he ru ka dpal las btud de/_/de'i bsgrub pa'i rim pa bshad/_/
translated: and will explain his practice.

original: dbang bskur ba thob cing dam tshhig dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa dpal 'khor lo
analyzed: dbang bskur ba thob cing dam tshhig dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa dpal 'khor lo
translated: A practitioner who has received empowerment and possesses the samayas,🔽a person who meditates on the coemergent glorious Cakrasaṃvara,

original: sdom pa lhan cig skyes pa bsgom pa'i gang zag gis/_gnas dben par stan bde
analyzed: sdom pa lhan cig skyes pa bsgom pa'i gang zag gis/_gnas dben par stan bde
translated: should sit on a comfortable seat in an isolated place,

original: ba la sdad/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang byang chub kyi sems bsgom/_de nas/_om swa b+ha🔽wa shud d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+ha wa shud d+ho ham/_zhes brjod pas snang ba thams cad stong
analyzed: ba la sdad/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang byang chub kyi sems bsgom/_de nas/_om swa b+ha wa shud d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+ha wa shud d+ho ham/_zhes brjod pas snang ba thams cad stong
translated: go for refuge, and meditate on bodhicitta.🔽Then, by reciting “oṃ svabhāva śuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāva śuddho’haṃ,”🔽meditate that all appearances are emptiness.

original: par bsgom/_stong pa'i ngang las rang nyid bde mchog lhan cig skyes pa/_sku
analyzed: par bsgom/_stong pa'i ngang las rang nyid bde mchog lhan cig skyes pa/_sku
translated: From within emptiness, one arises as Coemergent Cakrasaṃvara,

original: mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_g.yas pa rdo rje/_g.yon dril bu
analyzed: mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_g.yas pa rdo rje/_g.yon dril bu
translated: holding a vajra in his right hand and a bell in his left,

original: 'dzin pas yum la mkhyud pa/_spyan gsum pa zhal mche ba brtshigs pa/_ral
analyzed: 'dzin pas yum la mkhyud pa/_spyan gsum pa zhal mche ba brtshigs pa/_ral
translated: embracing the mother. He has three eyes, bared fangs,🔽and a topknot of matted hair bound with a diadem of skulls

original: pa'i thor tshhugs kyi spyi bor bcings pa'i rtshe mo na yid bzhin gyi nor bus brgyan pa/
analyzed: pa'i thor tshhugs kyi spyi bor bcings pa'i rtshe mo na yid bzhin gyi nor bus brgyan pa/
translated: and adorned with a wish-fulfilling jewel.

original: g.yon gyi cha la tshhes gcig gi zla bas mtshhan pa/_spyi bo'i gtshug tu sna tshhogs rdo
analyzed: g.yon gyi cha la tshhes gcig gi zla bas mtshhan pa/_spyi bo'i gtshug tu sna tshhogs rdo
translated: On his left side is a crescent moon, and on the crown of his head is a multicolored vajra

original: rjes mtshhan pa mi mgo skam po lnga'i dbu brgyan can/_sku la rus pa'i rgyan drug
analyzed: rjes mtshhan pa mi mgo skam po lnga'i dbu brgyan can/_sku la rus pa'i rgyan drug
translated: marked with a human skull. He is adorned with the six bone ornaments

original: gis brgyan pa/_pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na/_zhabs g.yas
analyzed: gis brgyan pa/_pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na/_zhabs g.yas
translated: and stands on a lotus and sun seat with his right

original: bskyang bas dbu ma dmar mo mnan pa/_g.yon bskum pas 'jigs byed nag po🔽mnan pa/_mgul rgyan sbyin pa/_rna rgyan bzod pa/_gdu gu tshhul khrims/
analyzed: bskyang bas dbu ma dmar mo mnan pa/_g.yon bskum pas 'jigs byed nag po mnan pa/_mgul rgyan sbyin pa/_rna rgyan bzod pa/_gdu gu tshhul khrims/
translated: leg extended, pressing on red Yamāri, and his left leg bent, pressing on black Bhairava.🔽The necklace is generosity, the earrings are patience, the bracelets and anklets are discipline,

original: ske rags brtshon 'grus/_spyi gtshug 'khor lo bsam gtan/_thal rgya shes rab
analyzed: ske rags brtshon 'grus/_spyi gtshug 'khor lo bsam gtan/_thal rgya shes rab
translated: the crown is concentration, the earrings are wisdom,🔽and the belt is diligence.

original: po/_stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs grol ba/_/mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu'i do
analyzed: po/_stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs grol ba/_/mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu'i do
translated: He is adorned with a tiger-skin skirt and a necklace of fifty fresh human heads.

original: shal byas pa/_gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa/_mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa can
analyzed: shal byas pa/_gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa/_mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa can
translated: He has the nine expressions of dance and is crowned with Akṣobhya.

original: no/_/yum rdo rje phag mo sku mdog dmar mo/_spyan gsum ma/_mche ba rnam par
analyzed: no/_/yum rdo rje phag mo sku mdog dmar mo/_spyan gsum ma/_mche ba rnam par
translated: The mother is red Vajravārāhī, with three eyes, bared fangs,

original: brtshigs ma/_skra gol ba/_thod pa skam po lnga'i thod can/_skam po lnga bcu'i do
analyzed: brtshigs ma/_skra gol ba/_thod pa skam po lnga'i thod can/_skam po lnga bcu'i do
translated: and loose hair. She has a tiara of five dried skulls and a necklace of fifty dried skulls.

original: shal can/_rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan pa/_phyag g.yas gri gug dang bcas pas sdigs 'dzub mdzad pa/_g.yon thod pa khrag can 'dzin pas yab la
analyzed: shal can/_rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan pa/_phyag g.yas gri gug dang bcas pas sdigs 'dzub mdzad pa/_g.yon thod pa khrag can 'dzin pas yab la
translated: She is crowned with Vairocana, with her right hand brandishing a flaying knife and making the threatening gesture and with her left hand holding a blood-filled skull cup, embracing the father.

original: 'khyud pa/_gcer bu phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/_yab yum gnyis ka snyoms par
analyzed: 'khyud pa/_gcer bu phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/_yab yum gnyis ka snyoms par
translated: She is naked, adorned with the five symbolic ornaments, and in union with the father.

original: 'jug pa/_ye shes kyi me rab tu 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa'o/_/de'i
analyzed: 'jug pa/_ye shes kyi me rab tu 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa'o/_/de'i
translated: Both are in the center of a blazing fire of timeless awareness.

original: thugs kha nas hum las sangs rgyas rigs lnga dpag tu med pa spros nas/_sems
analyzed: thugs kha nas hum las sangs rgyas rigs lnga dpag tu med pa spros nas/_sems
translated: From the hūṃ in their hearts, immeasurable five buddha family awareness beings are emanated and return with the awareness elixir.

original: can thams cad lhan skyes kyi go 'phangs la bkod/_tshhur 'dus rang la thim🔽par bsam mo/_/de nas bdag dang sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi
analyzed: can thams cad lhan skyes kyi go 'phangs la bkod/_tshhur 'dus rang la thim par bsam mo/_/de nas bdag dang sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi
translated: Imagine that all sentient beings are brought to the level of the connate [union] and dissolve into you.

original: dkyil 'khor 'ba' zhig yin la/_de thams cad snang la rang bzhin med pa me
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'ba' zhig yin la/_de thams cad snang la rang bzhin med pa me
translated: Then, imagine that you and all sentient beings are solely the maṇḍala of the buddhas, and that all of that is apparent yet without intrinsic nature, like reflections in a

original: long gi gzugs brnyan lta bur bsams la rang gi blo re zhig mnyam par bzhag
analyzed: long gi gzugs brnyan lta bur bsams la rang gi blo re zhig mnyam par bzhag
translated: mirror. Rest your mind in equipoise for a while.

original: par bya'o/_/de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o/_/
analyzed: par bya'o/_/de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o/_/
translated: That is the creation stage.

original: rnal 'byor bcu pa bzhugs snyo//
analyzed: rnal 'byor bcu pa bzhugs snyo//
translated: The Ten Yogas

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom par 'dod na/_lus dkyil krung /_lag pa🔽mnyam bzhag_/sgal tshhigs drang por byas nas/_lte ba'i nang du a shad kyi
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom par 'dod na/_lus dkyil krung /_lag pa mnyam bzhag_/sgal tshhigs drang por byas nas/_lte ba'i nang du a shad kyi
translated: If you wish to meditate on the completion stage, straighten your body,

original: rnam pa lta bu/_phra ba rtshub pa dar dang ldan pa cig bsams nas/_de'i nus
analyzed: rnam pa lta bu/_phra ba rtshub pa dar dang ldan pa cig bsams nas/_de'i nus
translated: hands in the gesture of equanimity, and spine. Imagine that inside the navel there is a form like a vertical fire stick,

original: pas rang gi sdig pa dang nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad bsregs/_spyi bo nas
analyzed: pas rang gi sdig pa dang nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad bsregs/_spyi bo nas
translated: fine, with a flickering tip. Through its power, all of your misdeeds, illnesses, and sufferings are burned. From the🔽crown of your head, a stream of white nectar descends.

original: byang chub kyi sems phab nas des lus thams cad khyab pas bde bas gang /_bde
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems phab nas des lus thams cad khyab pas bde bas gang /_bde
translated: The bodhicitta descends and fills the whole body with bliss.

original: ba des rtog pa thams cad 'gags nas bde stong zung 'jug gi ngang la mnyam
analyzed: ba des rtog pa thams cad 'gags nas bde stong zung 'jug gi ngang la mnyam
translated: That bliss stops all thoughts, and one should rest in equipoise in the state of the union of bliss and emptiness.

original: par bzhag par bya'o/_/goms pas drod dang bde ba dang mi rtog pa'i ting nge
analyzed: par bzhag par bya'o/_/goms pas drod dang bde ba dang mi rtog pa'i ting nge
translated: Through familiarity, heat, bliss, and nonconceptual samādhi will arise.

original: 'dzin skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/_/🔽de nas bzlas pa byed par 'dod na rang gi snying kha'i nyi ma'i steng du hum
analyzed: 'dzin skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/_/ de nas bzlas pa byed par 'dod na rang gi snying kha'i nyi ma'i steng du hum
translated: That is the completion stage.🔽If one wishes to do the recitation, imagine a blue hūṃ on the sun in one’s heart.

original: sngon po bsam/_de la sngags kyi phreng ba 'od kyi rnam par byung nas rang gi zhal
analyzed: sngon po bsam/_de la sngags kyi phreng ba 'od kyi rnam par byung nas rang gi zhal
translated: A mantra string emerges from that in the form of light, exits one’s mouth,

original: nas 'thon/_yum gyi zhal du zhugs/_yum gyi mkha' nas 'thon yab kyi rdo rje'i🔽sbu gu nas zhugs shing 'khor bas sdig pa dang sgrib pa dag_/bsod nams dang ye
analyzed: nas 'thon/_yum gyi zhal du zhugs/_yum gyi mkha' nas 'thon yab kyi rdo rje'i sbu gu nas zhugs shing 'khor bas sdig pa dang sgrib pa dag_/bsod nams dang ye
translated: enters the mother’s mouth, exits from the mother’s space, enters through the father’s vajra,

original: shes kyi tshhogs rgyas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'jug par bsam zhing /
analyzed: shes kyi tshhogs rgyas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes 'jug par bsam zhing /
translated: and circles around. Imagine that it purifies misdeeds and obscurations, increases the accumulations of merit and wisdom, and the gnosis of all buddhas enters.

original: om tshhogs ha hu~m hu~m phat ces ci nus su bzlas so/_/bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor/🔽khrus byed pa'i tshhe rang bzhin gyi gnas nas sangs rgyas rigs lngas rin po
analyzed: om tshhogs ha hu~m hu~m phat ces ci nus su bzlas so/_/bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor/ khrus byed pa'i tshhe rang bzhin gyi gnas nas sangs rgyas rigs lngas rin po
translated: The yoga of recitation:

original: che'i bum pa chus gang bas bdag gi spyi bo nas blugs pas lus ngag yid gsum gyi
analyzed: che'i bum pa chus gang bas bdag gi spyi bo nas blugs pas lus ngag yid gsum gyi
translated: When washing, imagine that the five buddha families from their natural abodes pour the contents of their jeweled vases filled with water onto your head, purifying the stains of your body, speech, and mind.🔽Recite the hundred-syllable mantra and wash.

original: dri ma sbyangs par bsam zhing yi ge brgya pa brjod la khrus bya'o/_/khrus kyi rnal🔽'byor ro/_/🔽de nas mchod pa dang gtor ma'i rnal 'byor ni/_chu gnyis sngon du 'gro
analyzed: dri ma sbyangs par bsam zhing yi ge brgya pa brjod la khrus bya'o/_/khrus kyi rnal 'byor ro/_/ de nas mchod pa dang gtor ma'i rnal 'byor ni/_chu gnyis sngon du 'gro
translated: The yoga of washing:🔽Then, for the yoga of offerings and tormas, first arrange the two waters and the five offerings and the torma,

original: ba'i mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma bshams nas/_om sum b+ha ni/_ni sum b+ha hu~m hu~m
analyzed: ba'i mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma bshams nas/_om sum b+ha ni/_ni sum b+ha hu~m hu~m
translated: and recite:🔽oṃ sumbha niḥ sumbha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: phat/_om grin+na grih+na hu~m hu~m phat/_grit+na pa ya grit+na pa ya hu~m hum phat/_om a na
analyzed: phat/_om grin+na grih+na hu~m hu~m phat/_grit+na pa ya grit+na pa ya hu~m hum phat/_om a na
translated: oṃ gṛhṇa gṛhṇa hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽gṛhṇāpaya gṛhṇāpaya hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ🔽oṃ ānayaho bhagavān vajra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ

original: ya ho/_b+ha ga wa na badzra ra dza hum hum phat/_ces brjod pas ma dag pa bsang /
analyzed: ya ho/_b+ha ga wa na badzra ra dza hum hum phat/_ces brjod pas ma dag pa bsang /
translated: Recite this to purify impurities.

original: gong du brjod pa'i swa b+ha ba'i sngags kyis stong par bsam/_stong pa'i ngang las
analyzed: gong du brjod pa'i swa b+ha ba'i sngags kyis stong par bsam/_stong pa'i ngang las
translated: Think that it becomes empty through the svabhāva mantra mentioned above.

original: lha rdzas las grub pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa bskyed nas
analyzed: lha rdzas las grub pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa bskyed nas
translated: From within emptiness, generate an inconceivable mass of offering clouds made of divine substances.

original: om ah_gis gis byin gyis brlab po/_/de nas rang gi snying kha'i hum las 'od 'phros
analyzed: om ah_gis gis byin gyis brlab po/_/de nas rang gi snying kha'i hum las 'od 'phros
translated: Bless them with oṃ aḥ hūṃ.

original: pas rang bzhin gyi gnas nas 'khor lo bde mchog lha drug cu rtsha gnyis kyi dkyil
analyzed: pas rang bzhin gyi gnas nas 'khor lo bde mchog lha drug cu rtsha gnyis kyi dkyil
translated: Then, light radiates from the hūṃ in one’s heart, inviting the maṇḍala of sixty-two deities of Cakrasaṃvara from their natural place.

original: 'khor spyan drangs nas/_mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs par bsam nas de la🔽mchod par bsams la/_om sarba ta tha ga ta shri tshakra sam+b+ha ra man+da la zhes pa kun
analyzed: 'khor spyan drangs nas/_mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs par bsam nas de la mchod par bsams la/_om sarba ta tha ga ta shri tshakra sam+b+ha ra man+da la zhes pa kun
translated: Think that they reside in the space in front and make offerings to them.🔽Add this to all: oṃ sarva tathāgata śrī cakrasaṃvara maṇḍala pūja megha samudra spharaṇa samaya hūṃ.🔽oṃ aṅgaṃ pratīccha maya svahā

original: la sbyar la/_om ang+gam pra titsh+tshha ye swa ha/_pa tam pra ti tsha ye swa ha/_badzra pus pe
analyzed: la sbyar la/_om ang+gam pra titsh+tshha ye swa ha/_pa tam pra ti tsha ye swa ha/_badzra pus pe
translated: Translation: Think that it becomes empty through the svabhāva mantra mentioned above.🔽From within emptiness, generate an inconceivable mass of offering clouds made of divine substances.🔽Bless them with oṃ aḥ hūṃ.🔽Then, light radiates from the hūṃ in one’s heart, inviting the maṇḍala of sixty-two deities of Cakrasaṃvara from their natural place.🔽Think that they reside in the space in front and make offerings to them.🔽Add this to all: oṃ sarva tathāgata śrī cakrasaṃvara maṇḍala pūja megha samudra spharaṇa samaya hūṃ.

original: a hum/_du pe a lo ge/_g+han d+he/_ni wi te/_om badzra shab ta a hum/
analyzed: a hum/_du pe a lo ge/_g+han d+he/_ni wi te/_om badzra shab ta a hum/
translated: oṃ aṅgaṃ pratīccha maya svahā

original: zhes bya bas mchod yon dang /_zhabs bsil dang /_me tog_/spos/
analyzed: zhes bya bas mchod yon dang /_zhabs bsil dang /_me tog_/spos/
translated: With those, make offerings of water for drinking, water for the feet, flowers, incense,

original: mar me/_dri/_zhal zas/_rol mo rnams kyis mchod nas/_de'i spyan sngar/
analyzed: mar me/_dri/_zhal zas/_rol mo rnams kyis mchod nas/_de'i spyan sngar/
translated: lamps, perfume, food, and music, and in front of him recite:

original: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi/_/sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags//
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi/_/sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags//
translated: I go for refuge to the Three Jewels; I confess each and every misdeed.

original: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung /_/
analyzed: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung /_/
translated: I rejoice in the virtue of beings; I hold in my mind the enlightenment of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas chos dang tshhogs mchog la/_/byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos dang tshhogs mchog la/_/byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/
translated: I go for refuge until enlightenment to the Buddha, Dharma, and the supreme Sangha.

original: rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir/_/byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par
analyzed: rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir/_/byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par
translated: I generate the supreme mind of enlightenment in order to perfectly accomplish the benefit of self and other.

original: bgyi/_/byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed bgyis nas/_/sems can thams
analyzed: bgyi/_/byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed bgyis nas/_/sems can thams
translated: Having generated the supreme mind of enlightenment, I invite all sentient beings

original: cad bdag gis mgron du gnyer/_/byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi//
analyzed: cad bdag gis mgron du gnyer/_/byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi//
translated: to practice the delightful supreme conduct of enlightenment.🔽May I attain buddhahood for the benefit of the world.

original: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog_/zhes bya ba yan lag bdun pa
analyzed: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog_/zhes bya ba yan lag bdun pa
translated: With those, perform the seven limbs.

original: rnal 'byor bcu pa bzhugs lho//
analyzed: rnal 'byor bcu pa bzhugs lho//
translated: The Ten Yogas

original: lan gsum brjod do/_/de nas gtor ma sbyangs la sum b+ha ni'i sngags kyis🔽bsang /_swa b+ha bas stong par bsam/_stong pa'i ngang las khams gsum khyab
analyzed: lan gsum brjod do/_/de nas gtor ma sbyangs la sum b+ha ni'i sngags kyis bsang /_swa b+ha bas stong par bsam/_stong pa'i ngang las khams gsum khyab
translated: Then purify the torma, cleanse it with the sumbha ni mantra,🔽and imagine that it is emptied by svabhava.

original: pa'i thod pa chen po ye shes kyi bdud rtshis yongs su gang bar bskyed do/_/'bar
analyzed: pa'i thod pa chen po ye shes kyi bdud rtshis yongs su gang bar bskyed do/_/'bar
translated: From within emptiness, generate a great skull cup that pervades the three realms and is completely filled with the elixir of timeless awareness.

original: ba'i phyag rgya dpral ba'i dbyibs su bskor zhing pho zhes brjod pas rang bzhin gyi
analyzed: ba'i phyag rgya dpral ba'i dbyibs su bskor zhing pho zhes brjod pas rang bzhin gyi
translated: Make the blazing mudra and, circling it in the shape of the forehead, say “phoom.”

original: gnas nas 'khor lo bde mchog mkha' 'gro chos skyong bsrungs ma dang bcas pa
analyzed: gnas nas 'khor lo bde mchog mkha' 'gro chos skyong bsrungs ma dang bcas pa
translated: Invite the Chakrasamvara dakini and the Dharma protectors and guardians from their natural abodes.

original: spyan drangs la/_de rnams kyis gsol bar bsam zhing rdo rje thal mo kha gyen du phye🔽ba'i phyag rgya bcas nas/_om badzra ar li ho/_dza hum pam ho/_badzra da ki ni sa
analyzed: spyan drangs la/_de rnams kyis gsol bar bsam zhing rdo rje thal mo kha gyen du phye ba'i phyag rgya bcas nas/_om badzra ar li ho/_dza hum pam ho/_badzra da ki ni sa
translated: Think that they partake of it, and with the mudra of the vajra palms facing up,🔽say “Om vajra arali ho/ja hum pam ho/vajra dakini samaya ste tri sha ho/om ah hum” five times to offer it.

original: ma ya ste tri sha ho/_om ah_hu~m/_zhes pa lan lngas phul la mchod pa lngas mchod/
analyzed: ma ya ste tri sha ho/_om ah_hu~m/_zhes pa lan lngas phul la mchod pa lngas mchod/
translated: Make offerings with the five offerings.

original: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab nas bzod par gsol te/_gtor ma 'gron
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab nas bzod par gsol te/_gtor ma 'gron
translated: After supplicating for the fulfillment of your desires, request forbearance:🔽The torma guests depart.

original: dang tshhogs kyi zhing om badzra mu zhes pas gshegs su gsol/_mchod pa dang gtor ma'i rnal 'byor ro/_/
analyzed: dang tshhogs kyi zhing om badzra mu zhes pas gshegs su gsol/_mchod pa dang gtor ma'i rnal 'byor ro/_/
translated: The yoga of offerings and torma

original: kha zas la longs spyod pa'i tshhe zas de om ah_hum gis bdud rtshir bskyed/🔽rang lhar gsal gdab/_de'i snying khar bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang /_byang
analyzed: kha zas la longs spyod pa'i tshhe zas de om ah_hum gis bdud rtshir bskyed/ rang lhar gsal gdab/_de'i snying khar bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang /_byang

original: chub sems dpa'i tshhogs dang /_lte bar chos skyong dang /_'jig rten pa'i
analyzed: chub sems dpa'i tshhogs dang /_lte bar chos skyong dang /_'jig rten pa'i
translated: the Dharma protectors and worldly deities are in your navel,🔽and you are making offerings to them.

original: tshhogs dmigs nas/_de rnams mchod pa'i bsam pas lag pa g.yon pas
analyzed: tshhogs dmigs nas/_de rnams mchod pa'i bsam pas lag pa g.yon pas
